## DocumentResource.delete() method

Deletes the specified document.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
delete(packageId: string, documentId: string): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  packageId | string | Package ID |
|  documentId | string | ID of the document to be deleted |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
